plot: Hollywood stars visit the Racquet Club in Palm Springs, operated by Charles Farrell and Ralph Bellamy; Walt Disney receives the Legion of Honor cross; George Breakston receives an Italian award; the camera visits Paul Kelly's stables.
title: Screen Snapshots Series 15, No. 7
plot_es: Hollywood stars visit the Racquet Club in Palm Springs, operated by Charles Farrell and Ralph Bellamy; Walt Disney receives the Legion of Honor cross; George Breakston receives an Italian award; the camera visits Paul Kelly's stables.
plot_en: Hollywood stars visit the Racquet Club in Palm Springs, operated by Charles Farrell and Ralph Bellamy; Walt Disney receives the Legion of Honor cross; George Breakston receives an Italian award; the camera visits Paul Kelly's stables.
